wikipedia_page.main: Ken MacKinnon (26 August 1933 – 21 May 2021) was a British linguist who is known as the father of Scottish Gaelic sociolinguistics.

response: * 21 May – Ken MacKinnon, Scottish Gaelic sociolinguist (born 1933)
*Ken MacKinnon, 87, Scottish Gaelic sociolinguist.Obituary: Professor Ken MacKinnon, Londoner who became a leading Gaelic linguist and historian
